targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) *8 FROM "$RP"."snmp_rx" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'if_octets') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) *8 FROM "$RP"."snmp_rx" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'if_octets') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance"

current.text: r-BIN-CATH; et-1_1_0 + sc-stor-dmd01-bond + sc-stor-dmd01-p5p1 + sc-stor-dmd01-p5p2 + sc-stor-dmd01-p8p1 + sc-stor-dmd01-p8p2 + sc-stor-nvm01

list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_rx" WITH KEY = "type_instance"
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_rx" WITH KEY = "type_instance" WHERE host = '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_rx" WITH KEY = "host"
